summary: This is an email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York dated March 27, 2020, transmitting draft submissions, likely related to legal proceedings in the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated March 27, 2020, from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The email transmits two draft submission PDF attachments, suggesting ongoing legal work or filings in the Epstein case.
The subject line references 'new and redlined', indicating the documents may be revised or marked-up drafts.
